message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $120. I believe it offers a great value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  $60 is quite low, but I'm willing to negotiate.  How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
